exercises.question: Fill in the missing consonant blend
exercises.explanation: The word 'dolphin' has a consonant blend 'ph' in the middle
exercises.sentence: The dolphin swam gracefully through the waves
exercises.solve: The letters d-o-l-ph-i-n spell the word dolphin. It has the consonant blend ph in the middle.

exercises.question: Fill in the missing consonant blend
exercises.explanation: The word 'elephant' has a consonant blend 'el' at the beginning
exercises.sentence: The elephant walked slowly through the savanna
exercises.solve: The letters e-l-e-ph-a-n-t spell the word elephant. It starts with the consonant blend el.

exercises.question: Fill in the missing consonant blend
exercises.explanation: The word 'lion' has a consonant blend 'li' at the beginning
exercises.sentence: The lion roared loudly in the jungle
exercises.solve: The letters l-i-o-n spell the word lion. It starts with the consonant blend li.

sections.title: Consonant Blends
sections.description: When two consonants appear together and blend their sounds

examples.explanation: The 'st' blend creates a combined sound at the start
The 'mp' blend creates a combined sound at the end

sections.title: Short Vowels
sections.description: Quick vowel sounds in the middle of words
